name: Pixel Pilot
description:
[IMPORTANT] Pixel Pilot is in a early stage, expect bugs and missing features. Please report bugs!

Pixel Pilot is a game where you fly around and mine to collect minerals. Explore to figure out who you are, what is happening and where everyone is.

The game is procedurally generated, meaning every solar system is new and unique! Explore them all, mining and searching for clues in this ever-ending journey.
